Error.title: Something went wrong!

IndexPage.description: Full-service medical travel organization to the best clinics in South Korea.
IndexPage.title: NS Med Travel.  Treatment in South Korea with comfort.

step1.title: Send a request
step1.desc: Fill out the short form or contact us via messenger.

step2.title: Consultation
step2.desc: We will recommend a hospital and estimate the cost.

step3.title: Trip to Korea
step3.desc: We will help organize your trip and accommodation.

step4.title: Treatment
step4.desc: You will receive treatment at the chosen clinic.

hospital3.title: Dong-A University Hospital
hospital3.desc: University hospital with a strong oncology department.

ortho.title: Orthopedics
ortho.desc: Treatment of knee, spine, and joint diseases.

ent.title: Otolaryngology
ent.desc: Treatment of ear, nose, and throat diseases.

dermatology.title: Dermatology
dermatology.desc: Diagnosis and treatment of skin, hair, and nail diseases.

ContactForm.title: Contact Us
ContactForm.description: Our consultant will assist you with all your inquiries. Contact them to learn about clinics and treatment costs in Korea.
ContactForm.name: Your Name
